With half of the United States Congress using our products and services, iConstituent is the leading provider of constituent communications software and services on the Hill today.

Founded in 2001 by a group of technology entrepreneurs, we have since flourished into a 70-person team that provides comprehensive communications solutions to the fast-paced and high-profile members of the United States Congress, statewide office holders, and state legislatures.
